name: Crowns and Pawns
summary:
A point-and-click adventure game by a Lithuanian game developer Tag of Joy. 
 
Crowns and Pawns is an adventure inspired by a rich history of Lithuania and its significance to Europe in the late middle ages. The narrative of the game blends legends and myths of the past with a vibrant and dynamic setting of the modern life. This, combined with a refreshing look at the classic point-and-click adventure genre, provides a unique and unforgettable experience for all of the adventure game fans from around the world.
